name: isoseq-pacbio-isoforms
title: Iso-Seq: PacBio Full-Length Transcript Sequencing
description: PacBio Iso-Seq (Isoform Sequencing) captures full-length cDNA for comprehensive transcript isoform discovery. High-accuracy HiFi reads reveal alternative splicing, fusion transcripts, and novel isoforms without assembly.
content:
Iso-Seq: Full-Length Transcripts

PacBio Iso-Seq generates high-accuracy HiFi reads of full-length cDNA molecules (5' cap to poly(A) tail), enabling unambiguous isoform identification without computational assembly.

Applications

  • Isoform Discovery: Novel splice variants
  • Fusion Transcripts: Cancer gene fusions
  • Alternative Polyadenylation: 3' UTR diversity
  • Allele-Specific Expression: Phased isoforms

Key Outputs

  • Full-Length Transcripts: Complete isoform sequences
  • Isoform Annotations: Novel vs known
  • Fusion Detection: Gene fusion calls
  • Quantification: Isoform-level counts

Perfect for: Isoform discovery • Fusion transcripts • Complex splicing • Transcriptome annotation
